QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT t.procedure_occurrence_id , t.person_id , t.procedure_concept_id , t.procedure_date , t.procedure_datetime , t.procedure_type_concept_id , t.modifier_concept_id , t.quantity , t.provider_id , t.visit_occurrence_id , t.visit_detail_id , t.procedure_source_value , t.procedure_source_concept_id , t.modifier_source_value , t.procedure_end_date , t.procedure_end_datetime FROM {sc}.procedure_occurrence as t JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND t.PERSON_ID = ch.PERSON_ID order by 2
